monitoring_aws_cloudwatchCustomAlarm.headline: Customise your cloudwatch alerts
monitoring_aws_cloudwatchCustomAlarm.snippet: Cloudwatch alarms give you the ability to notify you in case an alarm is triggered. The standard message layout of cloudwatch is very inflexible and not customisable. With this approach it is possible to fill HTML templates with further information, links and buttons to find the solution ASAP.

provisioning_azure_azuredevops.headline: Provisioning Solutions - Azure DevOps
provisioning_azure_azuredevops.snippet: The cloud native provisioning service in Azure is Azure DevOps formerly known as Team Foundation Server (TFS). Azure DevOps covers the full CI/ CD requiremenzs including project management. Due to its extensive extension features you can also replace features with other alternatives (see also under variations).

provisioning_problem.headline: Provisioning Introduction
provisioning_problem.snippet: This document describes patterns to automate the deployment of an application to a target environment. The major players in this documentation are (1) the process as a whole (aka provisioning), (2) automation code and (3) application/ infra code to be deployed. Additionally a third aspect is cross functionalities (3) that affect the automation and the application/infra code such as compliance.
